title: Movies Section Updated : BookMyShow Support Centre
body: Solution home FAQ's Ratings & Reviews Movies Section Updated Print Modified on: Sat, 21 Mar, 2020 at  6:37 PM How often is the movies section updated? The movies page on BookMyShow is updated daily, with the latest information available about the all the upcoming films. Did you find it helpful? Yes No Send feedback Sorry we couldn't be helpful. Help us improve this article with your feedback.
